headline.main: Indian Filmmaker Karan Johar Has Twins via Surrogate
headline.print_headline: Indian Filmmaker Karan Johar Has Twins via Surrogate

lead_paragraph: Leading Bollywood filmmaker Karan Johar said Sunday that he's become a parent to twins born via surrogate.
snippet: Leading Bollywood filmmaker Karan Johar said Sunday that he's become a parent to twins born via surrogate....
